Ceri Jane Banks CV

Personal Summary

An organised and efficient person with proven Web Development, Data Management and Administrative skills looking for a new challenge in an established organisation. A keen eye for detail and dedicated to maintaining high quality and professional standards. I am creative, talented, and innovative with an interest in sustainable business practices.

An articulate and diplomatic communicator who can work well as part of a team and as an individual. A very personable and reliable individual.

I strive to be better in all that I do, so continuous learning and professional development are something I am passionate about.

Career Break

September 2023 - Current

  • At the end of 2023, I made the deliberate decision to pause my career and embark on a journey of personal growth and retraining. I've completed several full-stack applications from concept to deployment, and am confident in my new found abilities.
